snippet.title: C64 Longplay: Polar Pierre
snippet.description: One of the earliest and most gruelling platformers to come out for the Commodore 64 and the Atari 800. It was bugging me for a while to be completed but I found it too tough. I finally lay this to rest and bury it under six feet of snow. Save-states used.
